title: Tech View: Nifty50 sends mixed signals; support seen at 17,550 level - Economic Times
content: Tech View: Nifty50 sends mixed signals; support seen at 17,550 level  Economic Times
description: "The daily chart is hinting at a short-term bottom but an indecisive Doji on the weekly chart is raising the question mark about the upmove, which is in progress from the low of 15,671 over a period of five weeks. A stay above 17,600 level can help the bulls retest recent highs at around 18,100 levels," said Mazhar Mohammad of Chartviewindia.in.
